method: Pour fruit juice into a saucepan and bring to a simmer.
Add gelatin to the simmering fruit juice, stirring until completely dissolved.
Remove from heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
Add food coloring and laughter essence to the mixture and stir well.
Pour the mixture into individual molds or a large jelly mold.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or until set.
Remove from molds and serve with a smile!
